Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2015 08:24PM BoyntonBeachMama wrote: I can only answer how the MRI guided biopsy is.  Numbing the area is the most painful part and it is not that bad.   My Radiologist slowly went in because the area was deep in the breast.  Once the area was numb, it did not hurt, just pressure.   Good Luck!  :)
